## getSelectedGroup variable

Takes an empty selection and expands it out to the nearest group not matching the excluded characters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSelectedGroup: (state: Readonly<PMEditorState<any>>, exclude: RegExp) => false | FromToParams
```

## Remarks

Can be used to find the nearest selected word. See [getSelectedWord](./core-utils.getselectedword.md)
